column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Enemy units at Charlois are totally neutralized. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. The vehicles at Objective Two are burning and destroyed. Over.
Papa Bear, Papa Bear, this is Alpha One. The tank laagers at the third objective site are destroyed. Over.
Alpha to Papa Bear. The vehicles north of Beckum are burning wrecks. Over.
Alpha Black to HQ. Be advised, we've returned to base and are standing down. Alpha out.
We copy you loud and clear, Alpha One. We confirm, Charlois is clear. This is Papa Bear, signing off.
Roger that, Alpha. Good job out there. Stay on top of them. HQ out.
Papa Bear to Alpha. Roger that. Objective three cleared. Out.
Papa Bear calling Alpha One. Understood. Objective Four is clear. Out.
Affirmative, Alpha Black. Your mission is done. Nice flying. Papa Bear out.
